title: on it by section 23 of the Aviation Regulation Act 2001 (No.1 of 2001) hereby
heading: (1) A Levy in respect of the levy year is hereby imposed on the classes
text_raw:
4. 

(1) A Levy in respect of the levy year is hereby imposed on the classes 
of undertaking mentioned in column (1), in the appropriate portions mentioned 
in column (2) in relation to the matters referred to in column (3), of the 
Schedule. 

(2) That portion of Levy which is in respect of airport charges and the 
central levy shall be payable by the relevant class of undertaking in four 
instalments on the basis of invoices issued by the Commission quarterly in 
advance commencing the first quarter of the levy year. 

(3) That portion of Levy which is in respect of slot allocation charges and 
consumer protection charges shall be payable in one instalment by the relevant 
class of undertaking on the basis of invoices issued by the Commission in the 
first quarter of the levy year. 

(4) That portion of Levy which is in respect of new applications for air 
carrier operating licences; the annual monitoring fee for licensed air carriers; 
the late provision of annual audited accounts; the additional approval fee for 
substantial changes in licensed activity shall be payable as appropriate, in 
advance, by the members of the relevant class of undertaking. 

(5) That portion of Levy which is in respect of new applications for 
groundhandling 
for 
groundhandlers; the late provision of audited accounts and the amendment of a 
groundhandling services approval shall be payable as appropriate, in advance, 
by the members of the relevant class of undertaking. 

the annual monitoring 

service approvals; 

fee 

(6) That portion of Levy which is in respect of applications for travel agent 
and tour operator licenses in the circumstances set out in the Schedule and late 
submission of financial statements or monthly management accounts by travel 
agents or tour operators shall be payable as appropriate, in advance, by the 
members of the relevant class of undertaking. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [601] 5 

(7) Levied amounts shall be payable, not later than 30 calendar days from 
the date of the invoice, by direct bank transfer or equivalent instantaneous 
transfer of funds to the bank account specified by the Commission.

title: on it by section 23 of the Aviation Regulation Act 2001 (No.1 of 2001) hereby
heading: 5. For the purposes of calculating the central levy and the consumer
text_raw:
5. For the purposes of calculating the central levy and the consumer 
protection levy the passenger numbers used as the basis for the “per passenger” 
charge will be the total passenger numbers produced by an airport authority for 
the last full calendar year for which passenger numbers are available.

title: on it by section 23 of the Aviation Regulation Act 2001 (No.1 of 2001) hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations impose a levy on certain specified classes of aviation and 
travel trade undertakings, for the purpose of meeting expenses incurred by the 
Commission for Aviation Regulation in the discharge of its functions under the 
Aviation Regulation Act 2001, as amended. The fees set out in the Schedule in 
respect of the various licencing and approval functions are inclusive of the 
percentage change in the Consumer Price Index for the period October 2019 to 
October 2020.
